      • getFaces

        public java.util.List<ObjFace> getFaces()
        Returns:
        A List of the faces in this model. Faces link together vertices, textures, and normals.

      • getMaterials

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,MtlMaterial> getMaterials()
        Returns:
        An associative array of the materials loaded in the obj file. The keys are the names of the materials
